accessibility.title: Comprehensive Accessibility Testing
accessibility.description: Identify and fix accessibility issues to make your WordPress sites inclusive for all users
accessibility.introText: Our advanced accessibility module scans your WordPress site for WCAG compliance issues and provides actionable recommendations to improve user experience for people with disabilities.

issueLevels.title: Serious Priority Issues
issueLevels.description: Critical accessibility problems that prevent users from accessing content, such as missing alt text, poor contrast, and keyboard navigation barriers.

issueLevels.title: Moderate Priority Issues
issueLevels.description: Issues that may cause difficulties for some users, like inconsistent heading structure, unclear form labels, or missing ARIA attributes.

issueLevels.title: Low Priority Issues
issueLevels.description: Minor issues that could enhance the experience but don't prevent access, such as decorative image labeling or optional suggestions.

testimonials.title: What Developers Say
testimonials.description: Trusted by thousands of WordPress developers and agencies

items.text: WP-Site-Inspector has completely transformed how we handle client sites. We've cut our debugging time by at least 70% and can now identify issues before they become problems.
The AI suggestions are incredibly accurate. It's like having a senior WordPress developer looking over your shoulder and pointing out exactly what needs to be fixed.
I've tried many WordPress analysis tools, but none come close to the depth of insight that WP-Site-Inspector provides. The accessibility module alone is worth the price.
As someone who maintains dozens of WordPress sites, this plugin has been a game-changer. I can now quickly assess the health of any site and prioritize what needs attention.
